gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 126, Bulls 111
gameRecap.excerpt: Paul George (28 points, five rebounds, seven assists, six 3PM) and Kawhi Leonard (27 points, five rebounds, 12-17 FG) combined for 55 points to lead the Clippers over the Bulls, 126-111. DeMar DeRozan tallied 21 points, five rebounds and four assists for the Bulls in the losing effort. The Clippers improve to 42-23 on the season, while the Bulls fall to 32-35.
